directions: Place the pork chops in the bottom of a slow cooker. Stir the mushroom soup, mushrooms, red wine, garlic, and pepper together in a bowl; pour over the pork chops. Cover and cook on Low 6 to 8 hours.
ingredients: 1 (10.75 ounce) can reduced-fat, reduced-sodium cream of mushroom soup
title: Creamy Drunken Mushroom Pork Chops
